Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.title: Highlord
Alarak.description: A Tank who specializes against Mages thanks in part to his innate Spell Armor.20 Spell Armor

basic.name: Discord Strike
basic.shortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
basic.fullTooltip: After a <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take <c val="#TooltipNumbers">175</c> damage and are silenced for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.

trait.name: Sadism
trait.shortTooltip: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes
trait.fullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

level1.name: Sustaining Power
level1.fullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c>.

level4.name: Level4Talent
level4.fullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">96</c> damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

level10.name: Deadly Charge
level10.shortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
level10.fullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.6</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

level10.name: Counter-Strike
level10.shortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
level10.fullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">275</c> damage.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.

basic.name: Annihilate
basic.fullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">96</c> damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

trait.name: DragonAbilTrait
trait.fullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">96</c> damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.
